title: The Real Reason They’re Attacking Tucker and Tulsi (Ep 1725)
description:
In this episode, I address the disturbing reason the media/liberal symbiote is attacking Tucker and Tulsi. 

News Picks:


Is our food supply at risk? 

The US government is pushing back on the bio-labs story.


Four in ten New Yorkers say they want to leave. 

China claims it’s captured a secret NSA spying tool.

Is inflation going to get worse?


A critical update on that Ukrainian bio-labs story. 


Hong King’s COVID crisis is demonstrating that lockdowns are ridiculous.

Another mask study goes down in flames.

No surprise, but Republican led states are leading the way with low unemployment.
